text: Ba'ze az mardum megujand: «Ba Alloh imon ovardaem. Va cun dar rohi Alloh ozore ʙuʙinand, on ozorro monandi azoʙi Alloh sumorand. Va cun az sui Parvardigori tu piruzie (ʙa sumo mu'minon) rasad, megujand: «Haroina, mo niz ʙo sumo ʙudaem». Ojo Alloh ʙa on ci dar dilhoi mardumi cahon meguzarad, ogohtar nest
